column4: hi i cant able to play any video files i also installed Restricted extras but while opening any video file it shows         "Error in opening/initializing  the selected video_out(-vo) device"      i tryed to open with Mplayer but the mp3 file plays well and sounds also good what to do give me a solution
Error in opening/initializing  the selected video_out(-vo) device <<< somhow the Xvideo extension does not work on your graphic driver ...
